verses.text: Keep not thou \w silence|strong="H1824"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: hold not thy \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, and be not \w still|strong="H8252"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.\f + \fr 83.1 \ft of Asaph: or, for Asaph\f*
For, lo, thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* make a \w tumult|strong="H1993"\w*: and they that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee have lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.
They have taken \w crafty|strong="H6191"\w* \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w* against thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* against thy hidden \w ones|strong="H6845"\w*.

They have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us cut them \w off|strong="H3582"\w* from \add being\add* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*; that the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* may be no more in \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*.

For they have \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* with one \w consent|strong="H3820"\w*: they \w are|strong="H3772"\w* \w confederate|strong="H1285"\w* against thee:\f + \fr 83.5 \ft consent: Heb. heart\f*
The \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and the \w Ishmaelites|strong="H3459"\w*; of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and the \w Hagarenes|strong="H1905"\w*;

\w Gebal|strong="H1381"\w*, and \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*; the \w Philistines|strong="H6429"\w* with the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*;

\w Assur|strong="H0804"\w* also is \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* with them: they have \w holpen|strong="H2220"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 83.8 \ft holpen: Heb. been an arm to\f*

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them as \add unto\add* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*; as \add to\add* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w*, as \add to\add* \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w*, at the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Kison|strong="H7028"\w*:
\add Which\add* \w perished|strong="H8045"\w* at \w Endor|strong="H5874"\w*: they became \add as\add* \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* for the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H7896"\w* their \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w* like \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w*, and like \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w*: yea, all their \w princes|strong="H5257"\w* as \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w*, and as \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*:
Who \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us take to ourselves the \w houses|strong="H4999"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w possession|strong="H3423"\w*.
O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w make|strong="H7896"\w* them like a \w wheel|strong="H1534"\w*; as the \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

As the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w burneth|strong="H1197"\w* a \w wood|strong="H3293"\w*, and as the \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* \w setteth|strong="H3857"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* on \w fire|strong="H3857"\w*;
So \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* them with thy \w tempest|strong="H5591"\w*, and make them \w afraid|strong="H0926"\w* with thy \w storm|strong="H5492"\w*.

\w Fill|strong="H4390"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* with \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*; that they may \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Let them be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* and \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*; yea, let them be put to \w shame|strong="H2659"\w*, and \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*:

That \add men\add* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* alone \add is\add* \nd \+w JEHOVAH|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add art\add* the most \w high|strong="H5945"\w* over all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
